title: 11/27/2020 - Hour 2 - Steelers and Ravens Face Another Postponement
itunes:title: 11/27/2020 - Hour 2 - Steelers and Ravens Face Another Postponement
description:
Does Lamar Jackson have the Madden Curse, being that he has tested positive for Covid 19 and his play has diminished since last season. Also, the postponing of the Steelers/Ravens game may have been a blessing in disguise for the Steelers. Brandon Weeden joins the show to talk Dashaun Watson's spectacular year, and the hurdles you have to overcome when losing a top WR as a QB.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
